website_summaries.verdict: Makes nice tennis ball-sized snowballs, but this may not be the easiest one for smaller kids to use.
pros: Makes snowballs – 3 at a time – that are about the diameter of tennis balls
Also works well for forming bath bombs
The size here is good for small hands
cons: This option may be harder for kids to use than single shot snowball makers, as you have to compress it really hard to get good snowballs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for bath bombs but its tricky not sure if itz gonna work out if not my grandbaby will have a smow ball maker. Its built well shipped quick no issues except how to get the bombs out ...learning curve...
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This actually works a lot better than I expected. You have to really compact the snow and press very hard, so it's difficult for children to use successfully. Once you get the process down, though, it makes some pretty perfect snowballs
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but i prefer the single snowball maker
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well, but does not pack them as well as the single snowball maker does. You can't get as much leverage in making the snowballs, so if you are using powder, they tend to stay powder like.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gan

customer_reviews.title: ... snowballs come out in two hemispheres instead of a nice ball.
customer_reviews.text: The snowballs come out in two hemispheres instead of a nice ball.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. HAGGAR

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wirick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: These make perfect snowballs for kids! They are just the right size for little hands. My 6 year old LOVES it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Ease depends on type of snow. Multiple "loads" of snow are needed in dryer powder type snow. Kids enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocfrk

customer_reviews.title: Sowball
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandsons. They loved these and made use of them during the winter. The snowball maker was motivation to go outside and play also.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson

customer_reviews.title: ... but the snowballs that this product makes are a great size for young children
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but the snowballs that this product makes are a great size for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Zally

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: smaller than i thought it would be, but thats my own fault for not reading the description. other than that i love it and i know my nephew will too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Grandson happy to see his gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that hasn't been used yet. However, my grandson was very, very excited to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: jayraysmom

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: This was wonderful. prefect snowballs. waited on first snowfall and we enjoyed it. Would buy again. Its was a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mary wright

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep the kids happy during a LONG winter.
customer_reviews.text: My children enjoyed the ease with which they could make multiple snowballs. The snowballs are about the siza of a tennis ball-perfect for throwing by small hands.
customer_reviews.author: M G-S

customer_reviews.title: It makes the perfect amount and it cuts my work time in half
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using this product for making homemade bath bombs and LET ME TELL YOU, it is absolutely fabulous! It makes the perfect amount and it cuts my work time in half. Truly a life saver! The only downside if I had to say anything negative, is that it does leave the logo imprint on both halves of the bath bomb but it's easy to press into the bomb to make the surface flat. But for a negative, it's so minor it hardly makes a difference to me. The pros far outweigh that little con.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Harris

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: My son tried it the other day on the 12th of February up on Mt. charleston, Nv. The product worked but the powder snow wasn't cooperating. I'll update this comment section once we can use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: snowball maker
customer_reviews.text: The Artic Force Snowball Maker is a fun toy that can be enjoyed by the whole family. I would buy this product again and recommend it to anyone who likes to play in the snow!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not make snowballs. Just filled up each 1/2. The single maker worked well. Save your money and time. Have fun
customer_reviews.author: L. Powley
